hints.content: Manueala scored $\pink{\text{more}}$ points against the Canada Moose than against the China Dragons because $1 \dfrac12$ is $\pink{\text{greater}}$ than $-4 \dfrac12$.

The correct answers are given below:

- $1 \dfrac12> -4 \dfrac12$


- Manueala scored more points against the Canada Moose than against the China Dragons.

question.content:
